column7: l'unification aurait été possible bien avant cela

column11: dass eine Vereinigung schon seit langer Zeit geplant war. Ein wichtiges vorbereitendes Ereignis war die Frankfurter Nationalversammlung von 1848. Wenn wir uns eine dominierende Position unter den norddeutschen Staaten erarbeiten
column12: können wir den Süddeutschen Bund gründen.;;Aunque Alemania no estuvo unida hasta la proclamación del Imperio Alemán
column14: el nacionalismo emergente del siglo XIX puso de relieve que la unificación era inevitable. La asamblea de Frankfurt de 1848 supuso un importante precedente. Al alcanzar una posición dominante entre los estados germanos meridionales
column15: podemos formar la Confederación de Alemania del Sur.;;;;;;;;;x;;

column1: become_guatemala_title;Become Guatemala;Devient le Guatemala;Werden Sie Guatemala;;Convertirse en Guatemala;;;;;;;;x  ;

become_guatemala_desc;The dream of a united Central America has died. The other provinces were too concerned about being dominated by Guatemala to realise the sacrifices we had made to keep the union alive. Well no more. We are done with them. Guatemala will find its own destiny.;Le rêve d'une Amérique centrale unie a volé en éclats. Les autres provinces étaient trop inquiètes par une éventuelle domination du Guatemala pour comprendre les sacrifices concédés pour préserver l'union. Eh bien
column2: voilà. On a en fini avec elles. Le Guatemala trouvera son propre destin.;Der Traum eines vereinigten Zentralamerikas ist tot. Die anderen Provinzen waren zu sehr mit der Dominanz Guatemalas beschäftigt
column3: um sich der Opfer gewahr zu werden
column4: die wir zur Beibehaltung der Union gebracht hatten. Jetzt ist es genug. Wir sind fertig mit ihnen. Guatemala wird seine eigenes Schicksal schmieden.;;El sueño de una América Central unida ha muerto. A las demás naciones les preocupaba demasiado la posición dominante de Guatemala como para comprender los sacrificios que hemos tenido que hacer para mantener la unión con vida. Pues se acabó. Que se vayan al Infierno. Guatemala buscará su propio camino.;;;;;;;;x  ;

column1: form_arabia_title; Arab unity;;;;;;x;;
form_arabia_desc;Brothers
column2: freedom is here
column3: we have won the battle for our destiny. Now the Arab people are on the way to resurrection!;Frères

column2: intercontinental British superpower.;;;;;;x

column1: form_brittany_title;Nazi Brittany;;;;;;x
form_brittany_desc;Although Burgundy has been given independence

column3: as not only are we still dealing with the French resistance

form_burgundy_desc;It is becoming increasingly clear that Germany will have trouble keeping the French Resistance down as well as keeping Himmler’s SS in line. In response

column3: thus focusing Himmler’s attentions elsewhere and allowing Burgundy to deal with the Frenchmen.;;;;;;x

column1: form_gran_colombia_title;Form Gran Colombia;Formez la Grande Colombie;Gründe Großkolumbien;;Forme Gran Colombia;;;;;;;;;x
form_gran_colombia_desc;Gran Colombia was a political federation established in South America in the wake of Simon Bolivar's successful liberation of the territories of Colombia
column2: Venezuela
column3: and Ecuador from Spanish rule. The federation broke apart in 1831. We are in a position to re-unite the North Andean peoples once more if we proclaim a new Gran Colombia.;La Grande Colombie était une fédération politique établie en Amérique du Sud dans le sillage de la libération des territoires de la Colombie
column4: du Venezuela et de l'Equateur de la domination espagnole
column5: réussie par Simon Bolivar. La fédération s'est disloqué en 1831. Nous sommes en mesure de réunir à nouveau les peuples du nord des Andes
column6: si nous proclamons une nouvelle Grande Colombie.;Großkolumbien war eine politische Föderation in Südamerika
column7: die im Zuge der Spanischen Befreiung Südamerikars durch Simon Bolivar die Gebiete von Kolumbien
column9: Ecuador und Gebiete von Peru und Guyana umfasste. Die Föderation zerbrach im Jahre 1831. Wir sind nun in der Lage
column10: die Nord-Andischen Völker unter dem Banner Großkolumbiens wiederzuvereinen.;;;;;;;;;;;x

form_iberia_spa_desc;For many years the Iberian peninsula was divided by two nations

column1: form_india_title;Form India;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_india_desc;The peoples of the Indian sub-continent must be united under a single banner: ours. It is the only way to keep us free of rule from European powers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_indonesia_title; Establish Indonesia;;;;;;x;;
form_indonesia_desc; After the liberation of the East Indies from the Dutch rule immediately threatened by the United Kingdom
column2: Portugal and Japan
column3: and the decrepit Qing Empire was not against easy prey. To maintain its independence
column4: the small island Asians have created a single state - Indonesia.;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_israel_title;The Balfour Declaration;La déclaration Balfour;Die Balfour-Deklaration;;La declaración Balfour;;;;;;;;x
form_israel_desc;His Majesty's government view with favour the establishment in Palestine of a national home for the Jewish people
column2: and will use their best endeavours to facilitate the achievement of this object...'\n\nSince we exert a significant influence in Judea and the Levant
column3: the ancient birthplaces of the Jewish Nation
column4: we can issue a declaration expressing our favorable attitude toward the establishment of a national home for the Jewish people there.;« Le gouvernement de Sa Majesté voit favorablement l’établissement en Palestine d’un territoire national pour le peuple juif
column5: et mettra tout en œuvre pour faciliter la réalisation de cet objectif…\n\nDans la mesure où nous exerçons une influence non négligeable en Judée et au Levant
column6: régions antiques qui virent la naissance de la nation juive
column8: nous proclamons notre attitude favorable à l'établissement d'un territoire national pour le peuple juif dans cette région.;Ihrer Majestät Regierung sieht die Etablierung Palästinas als nationale Heimat des jüdischen Volkes wohlwollend
column10: um das Erreichen dieses Ziel zu fördern ...'\n\nDa wir in Judäa und der Levante
column11: den uralten Geburtsstätten der jüdischen Nation
column13: können wir unsere Befürwortung der dortigen Etablierung einer nationalen Heimat für das jüdische Volk deklarieren.;;El gobierno de Su Majestad ve con buenos ojos el establecimiento en Palestina de una patria para el pueblo judío y no escatimará esfuerzos para asegurarse de que se alcanza este objetivo...\n\nDada la influencia que ejercemos en Judea y el Levante
column14: hogares ancestrales de la nación judía
column15: podríamos emitir una declaración en la que se exprese nuestra actitud favorable al establecimiento allí de una patria para el pueblo judío.;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_italy_title;Avanti Italia!;Avanti Italia !;Avanti Italia!;;Avanti Italia!;;;;;;;;;x;;;;
form_italy_desc;By establishing a dominant position on the Italian peninsula
column2: we can secure a national homeland for our people by proclaiming ourselves the motive power of a unified Italian state.;Grâce à l'établissement d'une position dominante sur la péninsule italienne
column3: nous formerons une patrie pour notre peuple en nous proclamant la force motrice d'un État italien unifié.;Durch die Absicherung einer dominanten Position auf der italienischen Halbinsel können wir unserem Volk eine nationale Heimat geben
column4: indem wir uns als treibende Kraft für eine vereinigte italienische Nation proklamieren.;;Al establecer una posición dominante en la península italiana
column5: podemos garantizarle a nuestro pueblo una patria nacional con fronteras seguras y convertirnos en el germen de un estado italiano unificado.;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

column14: dass eine Vereinigung schon seit langer Zeit geplant war. Ein wichtiges vorbereitendes Ereignis war die Frankfurter Nationalversammlung von 1848. Während der 1860er Jahre wetteiferten Preußen und Österreich
column16: hauptsächlich um die Vormachtstellung im Großdeutschen Reich. Jedes der beiden Länder gründete seine eigene Konföderation deutscher Staaten: Den Süddeutschen bzw. Norddeutschen Bund. Wenn wir uns eine dominierende Position unter den norddeutschen Staaten erarbeiten
column17: können wir den Süddeutschen Bund gründen.;;Aunque Alemania no estuvo unida hasta la proclamación del Imperio Alemán tras la Guerra Franco-Prusiana
column18: el creciente nacionalismo del siglo XIX supuso la unificación que se había estado barajando desde hacía largo tiempo
column19: siendo el Parlamento de Fráncfort de 1848 un importante precursor. Al lograr una posición dominante en los estados del sur de Alemania
column20: podemos formar la Confederación de Alemania del Sur.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_south_german_confederation2_desc;The conditions may be less than ideal
column2: but in order to maintain national security and strive towards South German hegemony
column3: we must approach our South German allies and create a confederation. Only with a united front
column4: under a single flag

column1: forming_thirteen_colonies_1_title;Create the Colony of America;;;;;;x;;

forming_thirteen_colonies_1_desc;As we seizes our first larger colonies in the New World we realized that fully controlling these large populations from Europe is nearly impossible so we should choose an easier approach and select governors to rule our colonies with our leadership of course.;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_2_title;Ceding Georgia to Colonial Leadership;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_2_desc;As we colonized the province that we named Georgia we should cede it to our stabilized and functional colonial government with its Virginian capital.;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_3_title;Ceding North Carolina to Colonial Leadership;;;;;;x;;

forming_thirteen_colonies_3_desc;As we colonized the northern part of the province that we named Carolina we should cede it to our stabilized and functional colonial government with its Virginian capital.;;;;;;x;;

forming_thirteen_colonies_4_desc;As we colonized the western part of Virginiawe should cede it to our stabilized and functional colonial government with its Virginian capital.;;;;;;x;;

forming_thirteen_colonies_7_desc;As we colonized the province that we named New Jersey we should cede it to our stabilized and functional colonial government with its Virginian capital.;;;;;;x;;

forming_thirteen_colonies_10_desc;As we colonized the province that we named New England we should cede it to our stabilized and functional colonial government with its Virginian capital.;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_main_title;Forming the Thirteen Colonies;;;;;;x;;

forming_thirteen_colonies_main_desc;As we colonized most of the free areas to the Eastern coast of the new land our original colonial government became overwhelmed with the control of this huge colony so we should try to implement some changes and redesign it
column2: so it can fulfill its purpose in a way more effective way
column3: also allowing it free expansion towards the west.;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_transcaucasia_title;Unite Transcaucasia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_transcaucasia_desc;Small Caucasian nations were at old bloody war with each other
column2: but when they found themselves caught between two empires - the Russian and Ottoman
column3: the peoples of the Caucasus at an accelerated pace began to seek a compromise that would accept all. Now
column4: when we control most of our mountains
column5: one Transcaucasian state can materialize from a dream into reality.;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_turkestan_title; Establish a unified Turkestan;;;;;;x;;
form_turkestan_desc; Turkic peoples of Central Asia have long been separated
column2: revealing a tasty morsel for the supergiants such as the Russian Empire and China
column3: but now we have the hope of independence and prosperity - a single Turkestan state.;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_union_latinoamericana_title; Latin American Union;;;;;;x;;
form_union_latinoamericana_desc; Latin American nations have a common history of origin of the Iberian peoples
column2: but because of the petty interests of corrupt politicians and the interference of third countries
column3: they were separated for a long time. But today - a historic day and the Simon Bolivar's dream finally realized. As time passed separatism! Ur Union! Viva la union latinoamericana!;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_union_nation_title;Form $CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$;Formation de $CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$;$CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$ gründen;;Formar $CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$;;;;;;;;;x;

form_union_nation_desc;Our dominant position among our cultural brethren puts us in a position to form $CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$.;Notre position dominante parmi nos frères culturels nous permet de former $CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$.;Unsere dominante Position unter unseren kulturellen Brüdern hat uns in die Position gebracht
column2: $CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$ zu gründen.;;Nuestra posición dominante entre nuestros hermanos culturales nos coloca en posición de formar una nueva entidad: $CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$.;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: form_united_kingdom_title;Form the United Kingdom;;;;;;x;;
form_united_kingdom_desc;Being in control of Great Britain we can now unite this island.;;;;;;x;;
form_yugoslavia_title;Form Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_yugoslavia_desc;The Slavic peoples of the Balkans must be united under a single banner: ours. It is the only way to keep us free of rule from European powers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
restore_pbc_title; Peru-Bolivian Confederation;;;;;;x;;
restore_pbc_desc; After the collapse of Peru-Bolivian Confederation
column2: during the XIX century
column3: Peru and Bolivia were many internecine wars in order to restore it
column4: but under his control. However
column5: not one of them failed. But now
column6: when ever an acute danger of being enslaved by other countries
column7: Peruvians and Bolivians cast aside their feud and remember that they - the southern andtsy! Long live the new Peru-Bolivian Confederation!;;;;;;x;;

column1: unite_moldavia_wallachia_title;Union of Moldavia and Wallachia!;;Union von Moldavien und Wallachai;;;;;;;;x
unite_moldavia_wallachia_desc;The nations of Moldavia and Wallachia have come together to form Romania!;;Die Nationen Moldavia und Wallachai sind zusammengekommen um Romania zu gründen!;;;;;;;;x
